typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	fileName as string ('58556')
}
source(output(
		{Company CR #} as string,
		{Company Transaction Type Arabic } as string,
		{Company Transaction Type English } as string,
		{Company Transaction type} as string,
		{PSMS - MoCI Transaction Types} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['TransactionType','Archive']) ~> srcTransactionType
Select1 derive(DS_FILENAME = $fileName,
		DT_FILETIME = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19)) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(ID_SK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,'[^0-9a-zA-Z]','') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
srcTransactionType filter(isNull(iifNull(iifNull({Company CR #} , {Company Transaction Type Arabic }, {Company Transaction Type English }), {Company Transaction type},{PSMS - MoCI Transaction Types})) != true()) ~> Filter1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		COMPANYCR = CompanyCR,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPEARABIC = CompanyTransactionTypeArabic,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPEENGLISH = CompanyTransactionTypeEnglish,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPE = CompanyTransactiontype,
		PSMSMOCITRANSACTIONTYPES = PSMSMoCITransactionTypes,
		ID_SK,
		DS_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME
	)) ~> stgTransactionType

parameters{
	fileName as string ('a')
}
source(output(
		{Store Code-رقم المخزن} as string,
		{Entity Commercial Registration No-رقم السجل التجارى للشركة} as string,
		{Entity Commercial License No-رقم الرخصة التجارىة للشركة} as string,
		{Warehouse/Store Commercial Registration No-رقم السجل التجارى للمخزن} as string,
		{Warehouse/Store Commercial License No-رقم الرخصة التجارىة للمخزن} as string,
		{Warehouse/Store Code-رقم المخزن} as string,
		{Area Name-اسم المنطقة} as string,
		{St. Name-اسم الشارع } as string,
		{Area Code-رقم المنطقة} as string,
		{St. No-رقم الشارع} as string,
		{Building ID-رقم البناية } as string,
		{Map Location URL-الخريطه} as string,
		{Total Store Area M2-اجمالى المساحة متر مربع} as string,
		{Storage Capacity in TON-السعة التخزينية بالطن} as string,
		{Storage Type-نوع التخزين} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
Filter1 derive(DS_FILENAME = $fileName,
		DT_FILETIME = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19)) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(ID_SK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,'[^0-9a-zA-Z]','') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(isNull(iifNull(iifNull(StoreCode,EntityCommercialRegistrationNo,EntityCommercialLicenseNo),iifNull(WarehouseStoreCommercialRegistrationNo,WarehouseStoreCommercialLicenseNo,WarehouseStoreCode),iifNull(iifNull(AreaName,StName,AreaCode),
iifNull(StNo,BuildingID,MapLocationURL),iifNull(TotalStoreAreaM2,StorageCapacityinTON,StorageType))))!= true()) ~> Filter1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		STORECODE as string,
		ENTITYCOMMERCIALREGISTRATIONNO as string,
		ENTITYCOMMERCIALLICENSENO as string,
		WAREHOUSESTORECOMMERCIALREGISTRATIONNO as string,
		WAREHOUSESTORECOMMERCIALLICENSENO as string,
		WAREHOUSESTORECODE as string,
		AREANAME as string,
		STNAME as string,
		AREACODE as string,
		STNO as string,
		BUILDINGID as string,
		MAPLOCATIONURL as string,
		TOTALSTOREAREAM2 as string,
		STORAGECAPACITYINTON as string,
		STORAGETYPE as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		STORECODE = StoreCode,
		ENTITYCOMMERCIALREGISTRATIONNO = EntityCommercialRegistrationNo,
		ENTITYCOMMERCIALLICENSENO = EntityCommercialLicenseNo,
		WAREHOUSESTORECOMMERCIALREGISTRATIONNO = WarehouseStoreCommercialRegistrationNo,
		WAREHOUSESTORECOMMERCIALLICENSENO = WarehouseStoreCommercialLicenseNo,
		WAREHOUSESTORECODE = WarehouseStoreCode,
		AREANAME = AreaName,
		STNAME = StName,
		AREACODE = AreaCode,
		STNO = StNo,
		BUILDINGID = BuildingID,
		MAPLOCATIONURL = MapLocationURL,
		TOTALSTOREAREAM2 = TotalStoreAreaM2,
		STORAGECAPACITYINTON = StorageCapacityinTON,
		STORAGETYPE = StorageType,
		ID_SK,
		DS_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME
	)) ~> stgWarehouse

parameters{
	fileName as string ('58556')
}
source(output(
		{Transaction Date - تاريخ الحركة } as string,
		{Transaction Type Code - كود نوع الحركة} as string,
		{Item Code - كود الصنف} as string,
		{Item Barcode - باركود الصنف} as string,
		{Your Company CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للشركة} as string,
		{Other Entity CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للطرف الاخر} as string,
		{Company Store/Inventory Code - رقم المخزن } as string,
		{Quantity - الكمية} as string,
		{Selling Price per unit - سعر البيع للوحدة  -} as string,
		{Comon Referance No. -  رقم المرجع المشترك} as string,
		{Internal Transfer Number/Code - رقم التحويل الداخلي} as string,
		{Number of Consumer Invoices - عدد فواتير البيع للمستهلك} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
Filter1 derive(STG_FILENAME = $fileName,
		STG_FILEDATE = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19),
		TRANSACTION_DATE = regexReplace({Transaction Date - تاريخ الحركة },'[^0-9a-zA-Z]+','')) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(SK_ID_SUR as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
source1 filter(isNull({Transaction Date - تاريخ الحركة }) != true()) ~> Filter1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		TRANSACTION_DATE as string,
		TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE as string,
		ITEM_CODE as string,
		ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		YOUR_COMPANY_CR as string,
		OTHER_ENTITY_CR as string,
		COMPANY_STORE_INVENTORY_CODE as string,
		QUANTITY as string,
		SELLING_PRICE_PER_UNIT as string,
		COMMON_REFERANCE_NO as string,
		INTERNAL_TRANSFER_NUMBER_CODE as string,
		NUMBER_OF_CONSUMER_INVOICES as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		TRANSACTION_DATE,
		TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE = {Transaction Type Code - كود نوع الحركة},
		ITEM_CODE = {Item Code - كود الصنف},
		ITEM_BARCODE = {Item Barcode - باركود الصنف},
		YOUR_COMPANY_CR = {Your Company CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للشركة},
		OTHER_ENTITY_CR = {Other Entity CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للطرف الاخر},
		COMPANY_STORE_INVENTORY_CODE = {Company Store/Inventory Code - رقم المخزن },
		QUANTITY = {Quantity - الكمية},
		SELLING_PRICE_PER_UNIT = {Selling Price per unit - سعر البيع للوحدة  -},
		COMMON_REFERANCE_NO = {Comon Referance No. -  رقم المرجع المشترك},
		INTERNAL_TRANSFER_NUMBER_CODE = {Internal Transfer Number/Code - رقم التحويل الداخلي},
		NUMBER_OF_CONSUMER_INVOICES = {Number of Consumer Invoices - عدد فواتير البيع للمستهلك},
		ID_SK = SK_ID_SUR,
		DS_FILENAME = STG_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME = STG_FILEDATE
	)) ~> stgTransactions

parameters{
	xmlfilename as string ('a')
}
source(output(
		ReleaseNotification as (Declaration as (ItemDetails as (Item as (countryOfOrigin as string, declaredValue as double, declaredValueQAR as double, foreignCurrency as string, hscode as integer, itemQuantity as double, itemQuantityUOM as string, netWeight as short, netWeightUOM as string)[]), SupervisorDetails as (Supervisor as (mobileNumber as long, name as string)[]), accountType as string, address as string, bolNumber as string, cargoManifestNumber as integer, carrierName as string, clearingAgencyCR as string, clearingAgencyNameAR as string, clearingAgencyNameEng as string, companyName as string, companyNameAr as string, countryOfLoading as string, declarationNo as string, declarationStatus as string, declarationType as string, email as string, entryOrExitPortName as string, establishmentId as integer, exporterName as string, firstCountryOfLoading as string, importerName as string, masterBolOrAWBNumber as string, portOfLoading as string, portType as string, releaseOrderNumber as long, releasedDate as string, supplierCR as short, supplierCustomsCode as string, voyageOrFlightNumber as string), NotificationDate as string, NotificationRef as string, NotificationSender as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: false) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(ReleaseNotification.Declaration.SupervisorDetails.Supervisor, ReleaseNotification.Declaration.SupervisorDetails.Supervisor),
	mapColumn(
		mobileNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.SupervisorDetails.Supervisor.mobileNumber,
		name = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.SupervisorDetails.Supervisor.name,
		declarationNo = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.declarationNo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenSupervisor
source1 foldDown(unroll(ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item, ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item),
	mapColumn(
		countryOfOrigin = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.countryOfOrigin,
		declaredValue = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.declaredValue,
		declaredValueQAR = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.declaredValueQAR,
		foreignCurrency = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.foreignCurrency,
		hscode = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.hscode,
		itemQuantity = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.itemQuantity,
		itemQuantityUOM = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.itemQuantityUOM,
		netWeight = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.netWeight,
		netWeightUOM = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.netWeightUOM,
		declarationNo = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.declarationNo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FlattenItem
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		NotificationSender = ReleaseNotification.NotificationSender,
		NotificationDate = ReleaseNotification.NotificationDate,
		NotificationRef = ReleaseNotification.NotificationRef,
		address = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.address,
		bolNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.bolNumber,
		cargoManifestNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.cargoManifestNumber,
		carrierName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.carrierName,
		clearingAgencyCR = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.clearingAgencyCR,
		clearingAgencyNameAR = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.clearingAgencyNameAR,
		clearingAgencyNameEng = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.clearingAgencyNameEng,
		companyName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.companyName,
		companyNameAr = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.companyNameAr,
		countryOfLoading = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.countryOfLoading,
		declarationNo = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.declarationNo,
		declarationStatus = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.declarationStatus,
		declarationType = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.declarationType,
		email = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.email,
		entryOrExitPortName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.entryOrExitPortName,
		establishmentId = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.establishmentId,
		exporterName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.exporterName,
		firstCountryOfLoading = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.firstCountryOfLoading,
		importerName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.importerName,
		masterBolOrAWBNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.masterBolOrAWBNumber,
		portOfLoading = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.portOfLoading,
		portType = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.portType,
		releaseOrderNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.releaseOrderNumber,
		releasedDate = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.releasedDate,
		supplierCR = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.supplierCR,
		supplierCustomsCode = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.supplierCustomsCode,
		voyageOrFlightNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.voyageOrFlightNumber,
		accountType = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.accountType
	)) ~> DECLARATION
FlattenItem sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		countryOfOrigin,
		declaredValue,
		declaredValueQAR,
		foreignCurrency,
		hscode,
		itemQuantity,
		itemQuantityUOM,
		netWeight,
		netWeightUOM,
		declarationNo
	)) ~> ITEM
FlattenSupervisor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		mobileNumber,
		name,
		declarationNo
	)) ~> SUPERVISOR

activities.name: GetFileList
activities.description: Get file list from processing container

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT 1
FROM [dwh].[STG_CUSTOMS_DEC] as SCD
WHERE 
(
try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([NotificationSender], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(datetime, NULLIF([NotificationDate], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([NotificationRef], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([bolNumber], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([declarationNo], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([declarationStatus], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([declarationType], '''')) IS NULL
OR NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM dwh.STG_CUSTOMS_ITEM AS SCI WHERE sci.declarationNo=SCD.declarationNo)
)
AND [NotificationRef] = ','''',activity('Lookup1').output.firstRow.NotificationRef,'''')
